Mobile UI Inspiration

Feeling stuck? Check out these sites to get inspiration for all of your app design needs.

Android Niceties

A solid (and rare) source for good Android design patterns.

Android UX

Another great source for Android design references, thorough and well organized.

Capptivate

Mobile design patterns and interactions for iOS.

Little Big Details

Not really exclusive for mobile design, but an indispensable reference regardless

Material Up

An extensive collection of Android Material Design patterns.

Pttrns

The go-to site for mobile design patterns â€” now with Android, iPad and Apple Watch sections. Their extensive categorization scheme per pattern is very useful.

UIGIFS

Interactive mobile animations for iOS and Android

UIHaus

A showcase of great mobile app designs, with multiple screens for each design.
